search.query: index IN ("prod_web" "prod_oracleforms") host IN ("stew.bcgov", "seethe.bcgov", "simmer.bcgov", "churn.bcgov", "parch.bcgov", "bert", "stubble", "orkney", "williams") sourcetype IN ("access_combined", "access_combined_wcookie")

index IN ("prod_web", "prod_database", "prod_jboss" "prod_ssg") host IN ("pulsar", "preon", "neutron", "aem1.bcgov", "aem2.bcgov", "glaze.dmz", "mince.dmz" "pledge.bcgov", "promise.bcgov", "hitch.bcgov", "saute.bcgov", "poach.bcgov", "stirfry.bcgov") sourcetype IN ("alert_prdj", "server-too_small", "access_log-too_small", "ecrc-too_small", "lra-too_small", "cso-2", "cso-too_small", "crc-too_small", "filingassistant-too_small", "essa-too_small", "dfweb-too_small", "psso-too_small", "ceis-too_small", "opra-too_small", "ApiGateway-Anon", "phis-too_small", "JrccOrdsApiWrapper-too_small", "pacws-too_small", "iris-too_small", "iris-4", "iris-2", "cdds-too_small", "ccd-too_small", "carmaws-too_small", "crrpservice-too_small", "cso-autoefile-batch-run", "essaws-too_small", "csows-too_small", "csojm-too_small", "cdds-3", "pac-too_small", "docUploader-too_small", "vipsws-too_small", "vista-too_small", "dfwebws-too_small", "cso2jpiws-too_small", "fams-too_small") | table _time tag

index="prod_web" (sourcetype="access_combined" OR sourcetype="access_combined_wcookie") host IN ("seethe.bcgov" "simmer.bcgov" "stew.bcgov" "churn.bcgov" "parch.bcgov") | table _time root config other status | eval application=root | eval application=if(like(application, "% HTTP"), "other_apps", application) | eval config=case( in(lower(application), "ceis", "coaf", "crc", "cso-2", "cso", "dfweb", "ecrc", "essa", "filingassistant", "jpi", "lra", "opra", "psso"), "JBoss - JUSTIN", in(lower(application), "jrccordsapiwrapper", "autoefile", "carmaws", "ccd", "cdds-3", "cdds", "crrpservice", "cso-autoefile-batch-run", "cso2jpiws", "csoextws", "csojm", "csows", "dfwebws", "docUploader", "essaws", "fams", "iris-2", "iris-4", "iris", "pac", "pacws", "phis", "vipsws", "vista"), "JBoss - Justice and Attorney General", like(config, "%"), config, true(), "other_configs" ) | eval config=if((lower(application)="12cforms2" AND config="other_configs"), "other_oraforms", config) | eval duration=(round(other/1000000)) | eval config=trim(config) | eval application=trim(application) | fields application config duration status | `jag_proxy_human_readable` | fields application config duration status | eval appName=if(application="Oracle Forms 12",trim(application.": ".config),trim(application)) | eventstats count(eval(isnotnull(status))) AS totalCount count(eval(duration > 30)) AS speedCount count(eval(status > 500)) AS gradeCount by appName application config | fillnull totalCount speedCount gradeCount value=0 | eval speedPercent=if(speedCount=0,100, round(100-((speedCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | eval gradePercent=if(gradeCount=0,100, round(100-((gradeCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | fillnull speedPercent gradePercent duration totalCount value=0 | fields application config appName speedPercent gradePercent | eval icon=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "check-circle", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "exclamation-triangle", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "times-circle", 1=1,NULL()) | eval color=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "#53A051", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "#F58F39", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "#DC4E41", 1=1,"#FFFFFF") | fields application config appName icon color speedPercent gradePercent

div.div: Performance - requests that take less than 10 seconds
Availability - time up in the current period

search.query: | where appName="CEIS" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="CEIS "
| where appName="CEIS" | timechart span=60s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="CEIS" | timechart span=60s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"

| search host="seethe.bcgov" | eval duration=(round(other/1000000)) | stats count(eval(isnotnull(status))) AS totalCount count(eval(duration > 30)) AS speedCount count(eval(status > 500)) AS gradeCount | fillnull totalCount speedCount gradeCount value=0 | eval speedPercent=if(speedCount=0,100, round(100-((speedCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | eval gradePercent=if(gradeCount=0,100, round(100-((gradeCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | fillnull speedPercent gradePercent duration totalCount value=0 | fields speedPercent gradePercent | eval icon=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "check-circle", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "exclamation-triangle", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "times-circle", 1=1,NULL()) | eval color=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "#53A051", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "#F58F39", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "#DC4E41", 1=1,"#FFFFFF") | fields icon color | eval count="seethe " | table count icon color

| search host="bert" | eval duration=(round(other/1000000)) | stats count(eval(isnotnull(status))) AS totalCount count(eval(duration > 30)) AS speedCount count(eval(status > 500)) AS gradeCount | fillnull totalCount speedCount gradeCount value=0 | eval speedPercent=if(speedCount=0,100, round(100-((speedCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | eval gradePercent=if(gradeCount=0,100, round(100-((gradeCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | fillnull speedPercent gradePercent duration totalCount value=0 | fields speedPercent gradePercent | eval icon=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "check-circle", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "exclamation-triangle", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "times-circle", 1=1,NULL()) | eval color=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "#53A051", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "#F58F39", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "#DC4E41", 1=1,"#FFFFFF") | fields icon color | eval count="bert " | table count icon color

| search host="pulsar" | stats count(_time) AS totalCount count(eval(tag="error")) AS gradeCount | table totalCount gradeCount host | fillnull totalCount gradeCount value=0 | eval gradePercent=if(gradeCount=0,100, round(100-((gradeCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | fillnull totalCount gradePercent value=0 | fields host gradePercent | eval icon=case( (gradePercent > 98), "check-circle", (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "exclamation-triangle", (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "times-circle", 1=1,"check-circle") | eval color=case( (gradePercent > 98), "#53A051", (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "#F58F39", (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "#DC4E41", 1=1,"#53A051") | fields host icon color | eval count="pulsar " | table count icon color

| search host="aem1.bcgov" | stats count(_time) AS totalCount count(eval(tag="error")) AS gradeCount | table totalCount gradeCount host | fillnull totalCount gradeCount value=0 | eval gradePercent=if(gradeCount=0,100, round(100-((gradeCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | fillnull totalCount gradePercent value=0 | fields host gradePercent | eval icon=case( (gradePercent > 98), "check-circle", (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "exclamation-triangle", (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "times-circle", 1=1,"check-circle") | eval color=case( (gradePercent > 98), "#53A051", (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "#F58F39", (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "#DC4E41", 1=1,"#53A051") | fields host icon color | eval count="aem1 " | table count icon color

| where appName="eCRC" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="eCRC "

| where appName="eCRC" | timechart span=60s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"

| where appName="Adobe Experience Manager" | timechart span=60s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="Adobe Experience Manager" | timechart span=60s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where appName="ORDS" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="ORDS "
| where appName="ORDS" | timechart span=60s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="ORDS" | timechart span=60s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where application="Oracle Forms 12" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by application | eval application="Oracle Forms 12 "
| where application="Oracle Forms 12" | timechart span=60s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where application="Oracle Forms 12" | timechart span=60s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"

| where appName="CCD" | fields * | timechart span=60s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
